title: Sudoku Solver
description: Full-stack Sudoku Solver built with Node.js, Express, and vanilla JavaScript. Features a REST API for puzzle validation and solving using a backtracking algorithm.

title: Url Shortener
description: Fullstack project showcasing my proficiency in Express.js and MongoDB. It efficiently shortens URLs for easier sharing and management. Built with a responsive design to work across all devices.

title: Dodgy Dave's Stock Prediction
description: React app that allows users to input stock tickers and generate predictions based on historical stock data. It fetches stock data from the Polygon API, processes it, and uses the Mistral AI API to generate a witty, confident stock prediction.

title: Point of Sale (POS) System â€“ CompuTech
description: A desktop-based Point of Sale (POS) system built with VB.NET and Microsoft Access. Includes user management, item and customer modules, and an order processing system with receipt generation.

title: Assembly: Endgame
description: A React word-guessing game with a programming theme. Includes game logic, keyboard input, and confetti win effects. Tracks wrong guesses by striking out programming languages.

title: Chef Claude
description: Frontend project showcasing my proficiency in React.js. The user enters ingredients for the Claude API and receives back a recipe with those ingredients.

title: Random Quote Machine
description: A full-stack quote generator using a custom PHP API to serve quotes locally. Built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and jQuery. Users can view and share random quotes on Twitter in a responsive interface.

title: Candle Shop Landing page
description: A simple landing page for an imaginary collection of handcrafted candles.
